requests.curl:
curl "http://gfwc-staging.herokuapp.com/api/countries" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/json; application/gfwc-v1+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Host: gfwc-staging.herokuapp.com" \
	-H "Cookie: "
